text: The 2019 season is Persib Bandung's 86th competitive season. The club will compete in Liga 1 and had qualified for the round of 32 in 2018–19 Piala Indonesia following their wins in the first two rounds in 2018. A season of mixed form saw Persib finish 6th in Liga 1 while the club's cup run ended in the quarter-finals on away goals to Borneo. ==Coaching staff== {| border="1" cellpadding="2"
